title: Government Polytechnic Sahjanwa Gorakhpur, Uttar Pradesh India: A New Era of Technical Education
description: The academic session 2025–2026 marks a proud beginning for Government Polytechnic Sahjanwa, Gorakhpur (Uttar Pradesh) under the vision of Hon’ble Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath Ji. The institution is committed to delivering high-quality technical education and preparing skilled professionals for the future.
content:
Academic Programs
 The college currently offers three major branches of diploma education, each with 75 seats: Computer Science and Engineering (CSE), Mechanical Engineering (ME), and Electrical Engineering.

In addition, an upcoming branch in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning (AI/ML) will soon be introduced, also with 60 seats, to meet the rising demand for advanced technological skills.

Facilities and Infrastructure
Government Polytechnic Sahjanwa ensures a student-friendly environment with modern amenities, including: Separate hostels for boys and girls, canteen facility with hygienic food, safe parking space, RO water supply, a well-equipped library with digital resources, modern digital boards for interactive learning, advanced laboratories and workshops.

Experienced Faculty
The college is proud of its highly experienced and creative faculty members, who are dedicated to nurturing innovation, discipline, and technical expertise among students.

Vision for the Future
With its robust infrastructure, industry-relevant courses, and the upcoming AI/ML branch, the college aims to become a center of excellence in technical education in Eastern Uttar Pradesh.

✨ Government Polytechnic Sahjanwa, Gorakhpur – Building the future of technical education under the guidance of Yogi Adityanath Ji.
